profileAlternative.name: Chad Carlisle
profileAlternative.headline: Regional Vice President - Southeast at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
My teams work tirelessly to enable customers to leverage disruptive technology to maximize business opportunity. MongoDB is the leading Intelligent Operational Data Platform. We make it easy to organize, use, and enrich data; intelligently put data where you want it, and extend the freedom to run anywhere.

Domain skills include: Scaling sales teams, recruiting, hiring, sales development, leadership development, skills development, forecasting, open source business models. Technology discipline spans infrastructure, middleware, databases, systems management, Linux, cloud computing, IaaS, PaaS, DBaaS, containers

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
Promoted to Regional Vice President, managing a team of 4 Regional Directors covering 22 EAEs
Hired 1/2 the EAEs and all leaders.
T3 certified in "Command of the Message"

I am hiring and love to connect with the best. Please - no blind connection requests without context. Thank you.

positions.title:
Title
Regional Director - Southeast
positions.description:
Promoted to 1st line manager for SE region. (Currently Hiring) and developing Enterprise Account Executives to capitalize on MongoDB's meteoric growth, contributing to the disruption of the $50B addressable market for databases. Public cloud, agile development, and Big Data have stressed the incumbents and you see this in the erosion of market share. MongoDB is the 4th most popular database in the world according to DB Engines.

If you are interested in a defining career opportunity, please connect with me. I am hiring A players and support them with the best compensation and enablement program in the industry.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Senior Account Executive
positions.description:
Execute our go to market strategy by working with prospects who use data to create new business opportunity and help them get there by reducing risk and accelerating time to value.

Consistently one of the company's top performers and work with our most strategic customers.

2012 - 152% of ramp
2013 - NA Sales MVP and 181%
2015 - 163% and #2 in NA (President's Club)

positions.title: Key Account Sales - Financial Services
positions.description:
Financial services vertical account lead in the southeast positioning the Red Hat technology portfolio including virtualization, Linux, IaaS, middleware, systems integration, and systems development. In this role I work with commercial banks, financial services ISV's, and payment processors.

2011 - 132% attainment - top 5% of region
2010 - 118% attainment
2009 - 104% attainment

positions.title: Account Executive
positions.description:
4th sales rep hired at JBoss where we scaled to 250 employees and $45m in revenue. Sold open source java middleware to F1000 early majority based on a value proposition of TCO and extensible architecture. Competed against Oracle, IBM, and Sun.

2004 - 165% attainment
2005 - 132% attainment

positions.title: Account Executive
positions.description: Software start up focusing on compliance solutions for highly regulated industries. Compliance 360 was acquired by SAI Global.

positions.title: Sales Representative
positions.description: Firewall and PBX monitoring software for Telemante.net Software, which was acquired by Verso Technologies in July 2001.

given.text:
I’m lucky to have had the opportunity to work directly under Chad, a leader who isn’t only interested in the organization, but also in his team’s professional growth. Chad’s product / market knowledge, combined with his expertise in sales was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic difference in the productivity level of our team. I was particularly impressed by Chad’s ability to handle difficult situations effortlessly, which always translated in the best-case situation for not only the company, but also for the client. On a lighter note, I’ve always appreciated our team discussion on sporting events that happened the week prior. As a leader, Chad earns my highest recommendation.
…
See more

Chad was one of my top sales reps at JBoss whom I could always count on delivering what he promised. Chad consistently hit his numbers and helped the company land some very strategic deals. I would hire chad in a second.

received.text: Antoine and I worked on several of the most strategic deals for the company.  Antoine does a remarkable job in creating a vision for where his customers want to be.  From there he applies a solutions approach that starts with the business win and ends with the technical enablement plan.  Antoine understands the requirements of developers, architects, and IT operations and does a great job in building consensus across these domains.
Ben is a hard charging sales leader with unique insight into the trends that shape Enterprise Technology.
